item.description: I am a Senior Lecturer (a.k.a. advanced assistant professor) at the Department of Economics at Monash University. My research interests lie at the intersection of Development, Politics, and Environmental Economics. I hold a Ph.D in Economics from Northwestern University. My research has been published in journals such as the Review of Economics and Statistics and the Journal of Public Economics. I have co-founded Data Basis (Base dos Dados), a nonprofit start-up with the mission to make access to high-quality data universal in Brazil and internationally.
